txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Tough carapaces from the insects and bog-lurkers within Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'These will serve my purpose well, thank you.'
'I wish to study the effects of the blight creeping toward Meluinen from the west upon the insects and bog-lurkers. The blight seems to be affecting their carapaces the most.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Tough Carapaces
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of tough carapaces.
Deliver the tough carapaces to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect tough carapaces from bog-lurkers and insects found in Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Tough carapaces from the insects and bog-lurkers within Meluinen.
